page.title: 16AMBULANCE STATION
page.content: THE AMBULANCE STATION IN ROXBURGH STREET SERVICES ALL OF BORDER REGION TAKING PATIENTS TO PEEL HOSPITAL BEYOND CLOVENFORDS AND HOSPITALS IN THE EDINBURGH AREA. THE VEHICLES ARE EQUIPPED TO DEAL WITH ANY EMERGENCY AND CAN BE CALLED OUT BY BOTH MEDICAL AND POLICE SERVICES. THE SERVICE REQUIRES A 24 HOUR MANAGING SERVICE SO THE MEN WORK A SHIFT SYSTEM. APART FROM THE NORMAL TASKS SUCH AS TRANSPORTATION TO AND FROM HOSPITAL, THERE ARE OFTEN EMERGENCY CALLS TO ROAD ACCIDENTS.THE BORDER ROADS ARE EN ROUTE TO THE CENTRE AND NORTH OF SCOTLAND SO VISITORS,MANY FROM THE CONTINENT,SOMETIMES FIND THEMSELVES IN UNFORTUNATE CIRCUMSTANCES WHEN DRIVING ON UNFAMILIAR WINDING ROADS.
